title: Skeleton Crew Pt. 2
itunes:title: Skeleton Crew Pt. 2
itunes:subtitle: The Losers rank every short story in Stephen King's 1985 collection Skeleton Crew, ending with the top 10. Chapters include: Intro/History, Morning Deliveries (Milkman #1) (25:00), Beachworld (35:00), The Reaper's Image (46:00), N...
description:
The Losers rank every short story in Stephen King's 1985 collection Skeleton Crew, ending with the top 10. 


Chapters include: Intro/History, Morning Deliveries (Milkman #1) (25:00), Beachworld (35:00), The Reaper's Image (46:00), Nona (54:00), The Reach (1:07:15), Gramma (1:24:10), Survivor Type (1:45:00), Mrs. Todd's Shortcut (2:03:15), The Jaunt (2:20:30), The Raft (2:36:20), Final Thoughts (3:10:00), and Outro (3:15:00) 


﻿Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
